content.rendered:
• This requirement is valid till 25-02-2022
  • Required Skills: Data Center Operator
  • Location: Bangalore
  • Domain: IT & ITES
  • Qualification: Any Degree
  • Experience: 3-5 yrs.
  • Job Description with Roles & Responsibilities: Data Centre Engineer performs various kinds of important functions to keep the center operating sleekly. They are responsible for setting up, managing, designing network systems by monitoring system operations as well as directing the IT solutions in order to ensure the data center equipment are working efficiently
  • Skillset: CLIENT – KYNDRL
  • PROJECT – BCRS
  • DESIGNATION – DATA CENTER ENGINEER
